title: TROLL TEE
text:
Introduction
The general idea is to test the ability of TROLL 4.0 (Maréchaux et al. 2024; Schmitt et al. 2024) to simulate a Throughfall Exclusion Experiment (TEE) in Amazonia based on the Tapajos experiment (Nepstad et al. 2002) compared to previous model intercomparisons (Powell et al. 2013) to assess its ability to model the response of tropical moist forests (TMF) to climate change (Joetzjer et al. 2014). Note: Water stress may be underrepresented due to the potential for pre-dawn drought, and this may be an opportunity to improve its representation with explicit tree hydraulic resistance.
